body.section: Hierarchy LastMenstrualPeriodObservation is a kind of Observation

section.title: Description
section.p: For women patients, this class represents an observation of when the patient's last menstrual period began.

stentry.p: This property indicates what was observed. In this case, it is hard-coded to LOINC code 8665-2, which means that the characteristic observed is the date that the patient's latest menstrual period began.
Contains the value of the clinical observation.
